prompt: I want to start a digital marketing agency focused on helping e-commerce brands with paid advertising. I have $10k to start, 5 years of experience running Facebook ads, and I want to hit $10k/month revenue within 6 months. Help me build this agency.
expectations: Asks clarifying questions about target market, ideal client, and current resources
Creates a strategic foundation including positioning and service packages
Develops a pricing model with specific numbers based on the $10k/month goal
Provides a 6-month roadmap with milestones
Creates operational workflows for client acquisition and service delivery
Includes financial projections showing path to $10k/month
Produces actionable templates (proposals, contracts, etc.)
Addresses the $10k startup budget constraints realistically

prompt: I have a small marketing agency doing social media management for local businesses. We have 8 clients paying $1,500/month each, but I'm working 70 hours a week and barely breaking even. I have one part-time contractor. What's wrong and how do I fix it?
expectations: Conducts a thorough analysis of the current situation
Identifies profitability issues and cost structure problems
Analyzes workload distribution and identifies bottlenecks
Recommends operational improvements to reduce founder hours
Suggests pricing adjustments or service restructuring
Provides specific workflows to improve efficiency
Addresses team structure and when/how to hire
Creates a plan to improve margins while maintaining quality

prompt: Create a complete client onboarding workflow for a digital marketing agency that offers SEO, content marketing, and social media services.
expectations: Creates step-by-step onboarding workflow
Includes templates for kickoff meetings, client briefs, etc.
Specifies communication touchpoints and timeline
Addresses internal handoffs between sales and delivery
Includes quality checkpoints
Provides specific deliverables at each stage
Creates checklists that can be used by team members
Considers different service types in the workflow

prompt: Build me a financial model for a content marketing agency. I want to understand pricing for different package tiers, project my revenue for the first year, and know when I'll be profitable.
expectations: Creates tiered service packages with specific deliverables
Provides pricing for each tier with profit margin analysis
Includes cost breakdown (labor, tools, overhead)
Projects revenue for 12 months with client acquisition assumptions
Shows break-even analysis
Calculates key metrics (MRR, CAC, LTV)
Creates the model in spreadsheet format (.xlsx)
Includes both optimistic and conservative scenarios

prompt: Do a health check on my agency. We're at $50k/month revenue with 15 clients, 3 full-time employees, and we've been operating for 2 years. I want to know what's working, what needs improvement, and what I should focus on next.
expectations: Creates a framework for assessing agency health
Evaluates financial metrics (revenue per client, profit margins, etc.)
Assesses operational efficiency and team utilization
Identifies growth opportunities and risks
Benchmarks against industry standards where relevant
Provides prioritized recommendations with rationale
Suggests specific KPIs to track going forward
Creates an action plan with 30-60-90 day priorities

prompt: My agency currently only does Google Ads management. I want to expand our services to increase revenue per client. What services should I add and how do I structure this?
expectations: Analyzes complementary services that fit with Google Ads
Recommends specific service additions with rationale
Addresses build vs. buy vs. partner decisions
Creates updated service packages with bundling strategy
Provides pricing guidance for new services
Outlines implementation plan including training/hiring needs
Considers upsell strategy for existing clients
Assesses risk and resource requirements
